thread.title: Ed Sheeran bought his parents a gym and swimming pool so they live a long and healthy life
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran bought his parents a gym and swimming pool so they live a long and healthy life

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Ed Sheeran bought his parents a gym and swimming pool so they live a long and healthy life
text:
Ed Sheeran bought his parents a gym and swimming pool so they live a long and healthy life The star wants to make sure they get to spend a lot of time with future grandchildren Share Ed Sheeran and mum Imogen Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ed Sheeran has had a gym and swimming pool installed in his parents' house. 
The 26-year-old singer wants his parents John, 60 and Imogen, 57, to live long and healthy lives so has put them on a new fitness regime. 
He told The Sun: "I think any kid at my age starts getting worried about their parents' health. I have bought them a cross-trainer and built them a swimming pool. Ed Sheeran is planning for the future (Photo: Birmingham Mail) 
"They are now training and swimming every day. I want them to be able to hang out with their grandkids for a very long time." Read More Ed Sheeran to headline Teenage Cancer Trust concert at London's Royal Albert Hall next month 
However, in his own home, Ed has opted to build a pub, where he intends to host parties in the coming years. 
He recently said: "I've built a pub. Like, I had a bar before, a bar where you could pour beers but now this has like a selection of beers, which is cool. He's currently in a relationship with Cherry Seaborn (Photo: Splash) 
"So, basically, there's an underground tunnel to get there that you can close off. So, if I have a party, everyone goes in the pub and no one can get in the house so you get no one raiding the cupboards or smashing anything. You have to go underground to get to the pub."
